markdownRemark.html:
This is the first blog I am writing using gatsby. This is an interesting approach. I hope I can use this method to build my own blog. It's actually interesting and very clear. The best part is the UI developed is pleasant and customizable.

Other advatanges of this approach are using it to call headless CMS, e-commerce APIs. In fact we can mix multiple APIs for a single site.

I have to learn how to do some of that in following days.
